about.me: ADAPerks is a single pool, independent operator focused on the goal of bringing true decentralization to the Cardano blockchain and promote widespread cryptocurrency adoption.
about.server:
Cloud based infrastructure (non-AWS) situated and administered within the United States. Geographically distributed, multi-cloud relays (2) and core for enhanced security and redundancy. 

	•	100 Gbit/s Uplink
	•	Redundant Power Supply
	•	Diesel Power Generator + UPS
	•	Fire Detection and Suppression Systems
